## icons.Icon class

The abstract icon class. Icons are visual elements that live in the top-start corner of the block. Usually they provide more "meta" information about a block (such as warnings or comments) as opposed to fields, which provide "actual" information, related to how a block functions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class Icon implements IIcon 
```
**Implements:** [IIcon](./blockly.iicon.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(sourceBlock)](./blockly.icons.icon._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Icon</code> class |

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [offsetInBlock](./blockly.icons.icon.offsetinblock.md) | <code>protected</code> | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The position of this icon relative to its blocks top-start, in workspace units. |
|  [sourceBlock](./blockly.icons.icon.sourceblock.md) | <code>protected</code> | [Block](./blockly.block.md) |  |
|  [svgRoot](./blockly.icons.icon.svgroot.md) | <code>protected</code> | SVGGElement \| null | The root svg element visually representing this icon. |
|  [tooltip](./blockly.icons.icon.tooltip.md) | <code>protected</code> | [tooltip.TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip.tipinfo.md) | The tooltip for this icon. |
|  [workspaceLocation](./blockly.icons.icon.workspacelocation.md) | <code>protected</code> | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The position of this icon in workspace coordinates. |
